co.uk.niadel.mpi.common

Interface NAPIData


  • public interface NAPIData
    Used to get info about the running version of N-API. Versioning follows Minecraft's versioning conventions: majorversion.minorversion.bugfixversion with the versions all capable of going up as high as possible, and don't follow decimal logic.
    Author:
    Niadel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String[] ASMD_CLASSES
      List of classes used in NAPIASMTransformer.
      static java.lang.String[] ASMD_CLASSES_OBFD
      List of obfuscated classes used in NAPIASMTransformer.
      static java.lang.String BUGFIX_VERSION
      N-API's bug fix version, increments every time I fix a "Nia-Derp" or other bug.
      static java.lang.String FORGE_MODID
      The Forge Wrapper @Mod's mod id for Forge.
      static java.lang.String FULL_VERSION
      The full version of N-API.
      static java.lang.String MAJOR_VERSION
      N-API's major version, increments every major overhaul after release.
      static java.lang.String MC_VERSION
      The version of Minecraft N-API is for.
      static java.lang.String MINOR_VERSION
      N-API's minor version, increments every update that just adds new features.
      static java.lang.String MODID
      N-API's mod id.
      static java.lang.String NAME
      N-API's name.
      static java.lang.String NAPI_ASM_TRANSFORMER
      Fully qualified name of the standard N-API transformer.
      static java.lang.String STATE
      Changes depending on what state of development this version is for.
      static java.lang.String VERSION
      The purely numeric version of N-API.

      • STATE

        static final java.lang.String STATE
        Changes depending on what state of development this version is for. Values I plan it to be: alpha, beta, release, snapshot-[whateversnapshotnumberitisfollowingMCsnapshotnamingconventions], alpha-snapshot-[snapshot], beta-snapshot-[snapshot]
